BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern tribal recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited from a tribal village, showing exceptional potential. The Midwestern Brotherhood saw value where Lost Hills saw only primitives.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as frontline infantry in the Midwestern Brotherhood's expansionist campaigns. [PAWN_pronoun] believed technology should serve humanity, not be hoarded.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern scribe
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] documented the Brotherhood's expansion across the Midwest, recording both victories and lessons learned. [PAWN_pronoun] advocated for sharing knowledge with worthy outsiders.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wore power armor in defense of Midwestern settlements, seen as a protector rather than an overlord. [PAWN_pronoun] took pride in safeguarding the common people.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern paladin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led missions deep into hostile territory, bringing Brotherhood protection to isolated communities. [PAWN_pronoun] believed in active intervention, not isolation.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern recruitment officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the wasteland seeking promising individuals to join the Brotherhood. Unlike Lost Hills, [PAWN_pronoun] valued character over pedigree.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern settlement liaison
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained relations between the Brotherhood and civilian settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] negotiated trade agreements and mutual defense pacts.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern tech specialist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] repaired and maintained equipment in the field, often improvising when proper parts weren't available. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to be resourceful.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern caravan guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] protected Brotherhood trade caravans across the dangerous Midwest. [PAWN_pronoun] knew every raider gang and mutant nest between settlements.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] treated both Brotherhood members and civilians, believing medical care shouldn't be restricted by chapter politics. [PAWN_pronoun] saved many lives.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern sentinel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] achieved the highest warrior rank through decades of service. [PAWN_pronoun] commanded respect from both Brotherhood and civilians alike.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern command officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] coordinated military operations across multiple settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] answered to the General, not some distant Elder Council.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern salvage specialist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] scavenged pre-war ruins for useful technology. [PAWN_pronoun] understood that in the Midwest, you used what you could find.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern training sergeant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained diverse recruits from tribal and wasteland backgrounds. [PAWN_pronoun] proved that anyone could become Brotherhood, given proper instruction.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern power armor pilot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] piloted one of the chapter's precious power armor suits. Despite coming from humble origins, [PAWN_pronoun] earned this honor through merit.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern field commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led squads in territory expansion operations. [PAWN_pronoun] made tactical decisions independently, far from headquarters oversight.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] built fortifications and infrastructure for expanding Brotherhood territory. [PAWN_pronoun] turned wilderness into civilization.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern armourer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained weapons and armor for the chapter's diverse forces. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with everything from tribal spears to laser rifles.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern scout ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ranged far ahead of Brotherhood forces, mapping territory and identifying threats. [PAWN_pronoun] spent more time in the wild than in any settlement.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern general's aide
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served directly under the General, helping implement the Midwest Doctrine. [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed the chapter's divergence from Lost Hills firsthand.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern tribal youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a tribal village before being recruited by the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to blend old ways with new technology.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern settlement child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a Brotherhood-protected settlement, seeing armored knights as heroes rather than overlords. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to join them.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern recruit trainee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] entered Brotherhood training young, learning alongside children from diverse backgrounds. [PAWN_pronoun] saw the strength in unity.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern scribe student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied under Brotherhood Scribes, learning both technology and practical skills. [PAWN_pronoun] was taught that knowledge should help people, not just be preserved.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern messenger kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran messages between Brotherhood outposts, learning the territory. [PAWN_pronoun] was fast and reliable.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern workshop helper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in repair workshops, learning to fix equipment. [PAWN_pronoun] showed aptitude for mechanical work.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern orphan adoptee
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned by raiders and taken in by the Brotherhood. [PAWN_pronoun] found a new family among the chapter's members.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern farm youth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on Brotherhood agricultural projects, helping feed the expanding territory. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that survival required more than weapons.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern squire candidate
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] trained as a squire candidate, hoping to one day wear power armor. [PAWN_pronoun] knew anyone could rise through merit in the Midwestern chapter.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwestern medical apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned medicine from Brotherhood medics, treating both members and civilians. [PAWN_pronoun] believed healing shouldn't be restricted.
